text: Ruff Creek is a large tributary to South Fork Tenmile Creek in southwestern Pennsylvania. The stream rises in north-central Greene County and flows southeast entering South Fork Tenmile Creek northeast of Morrisville, Pennsylvania. The watershed is roughly 27% agricultural, 64% forested and the rest is other uses. ==References== Category:Rivers of Pennsylvania Category:Tributaries of the Monongahela River Category:Rivers of Greene County, Pennsylvania
title: Ruff Creek (South Fork Tenmile Creek tributary)
